page.title: 08The Vetinary Surgeon
page.content: There is a new {Vetinary Surgery} on the corner of Glaen Road and Hillcrest Drive, Plympton. {The Vet is {called Nigel Taylor.} The building that is there at the moment is only temporary. The permanent building will be built in July. There are three surgeries and they are also open in case of emwegencies. The times of the surgeries are:- 9.00 - 10.00 am 2.00 - 2.30 pm 4.30 - 6.00 pm (by appointment) Monday to Friday. 9.30 - 10.30 am on Saturdays. They have a carpark which you can use when taking your animals to the vet. They are very good at their work. It was a good idea to have a new vet because most people have young children and they have pets.R.Phillips
